mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_id, mb_id, post_img, post_title, post_content, post_price, post_discount, post_dt) values (tbl_post_seq.nextval, #{mb_id}, #{post_img}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{post_price}, #{post_discount}, sysdate)
